name: Very Expensive Pizza
description:
In the future, pizzas are delivered via satellite!
Assemble you pizzas by selecting the correct ingredient, then deliver the pizzas to their destinations!

Try to delivery as many pizzas and earn as much money as you can!

Controls

Pizza Assembly:

  • Mouse + Left Click
  • OR Arrow Keys
  • OR "A S D"

Satellite Delivery:

  • Mouse + Left Click
  • OR Mouse + Spacebar

Press "Esc" to pause

Credits

Programming, models, textures, and SFX: Megalon
Music: Original song by HyperVirtualExtreme (remixed by Megalon)
Other: UnityResolutionDialog, LeanTween,  Shader Graph Custom Lighting

Made in one week as a personal challenge project!
